item.title: Deep Learning
item.description: Representations in terms of more representations (inception type vibe) Example Say you took a selfie, and we wanted an AI to find you in the picture.

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: Performance of model ‚àù Representation of data Examples A system that decides the salary of employees Would use database with features of employees (hours worked, company title, number of people managed) and their corresponding salaries to create a model Then uses model to assign salaries to future employees Bad data (where datapoints do not correlate to features) gives bad results Logistic Regression: Uses dataset to create mathematical correlations between features and outcomes TLDR: Use good features for good results

item.title: Representation Learning
item.description: Method that uses a set of techniques to let the system automatically find features needed for Machine Learning. Example: Auto Encoders
